meanings.definition: A whip-like structure used for movement in some microorganisms.
meanings.sent1: The flagellums of the tiny creature helped it swim through the water.
meanings.sent2: Under the microscope, the flagellums of the bacteria were clearly visible.
meanings.sent3: The flagellums on the microorganism looked like tiny whips ready for a race.
meanings.sent4: The flagellums of the cell propelled it forward like a tiny motorboat.
meanings.sent5: The flagellums waving back and forth were like dancers moving in unison.
